data.text: @nycHealthy Huh? A week ago the CDC and our governor told us not to. Get the F out of here with your mask nonsense. No one listens to you anymore @nycHealthy

@nycHealthy When are you going to start caring about the learning and development of our youngest children?!? Why are we continuing to mask low risk toddlers when Europe hasn’t masked kids under 6 all pandemic, WHO doesn’t recommend it, and we are not close to having vax approved for <5? https://t.co/x3CV6fJeYm

@nycHealthy @sciencemarchnyc Mandate masks. Don't just encourage them. Mandate them! Help protect the most vulnerable in our community! Get everyone to mask up while we get more vaccinated and boosted! #MandateMasksNY https://t.co/o8suFHPYSd

@nycHealthy @sciencemarchnyc Mandate masks @nycHealthy in all public indoor spaces and schools!! Right now you are forcing immune compromised and people who are high-risk for severe #Covid19, as well as kids under 5, to be locked inside their apartments to stay safe! #MandateMasksNY
@nycHealthy Face masks are useless and you can't breathe when you wear them. Breathe fresh air is much more healthy!
@kennedytwit7 @nycHealthy The Gov is wrong as hell
@nycHealthy Seriously ???? The Gov. Said we don’t need them
@nycHealthy @NYCHealthCommr Do you and @NYCMayor talk to one another?
